name: bioawk

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Bioawk is an extension to Brian Kernighan's awk, adding the support of
several common biological data formats, including optionally gzip'ed
BED, GFF, SAM, VCF, FASTA/Q and TAB-delimited formats with column names.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: bison
dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.
